subject: I am Mrs.Cornelia Maury; I am
body:
I am Mrs.Cornelia Maury; I am a US citizen, 52 years Old. I reside in
the state of Texas 75773. My residential address is as follows 23329
Live Oak Dr.Mineola,Texas 75773, United States, am thinking of moving
since I am now wealthy, I am one of those that took part in the
Compensation in Cotonou,Benin Republic West Africa many years ago and
they refused to pay me, I had paid over Us$52,000.00 while in the
United State, trying to get my payment all to no avail.
So,I decided to travel down to West Africa precisely Cotonou,Benin
Republic with all my compensation documents, and I was directed to
meet Barr.Marián Švarc, who is the member of OUTSTANDING PAYMENT AWARD
COMMITTEE and a Human Rights Activist (Lawyer), and I contacted him
and he explained everything to me. He said that whoever is contacting
us through emails are fake.
He took me to the paying bank for the claim of my Compensation payment
Right now I am the happiest woman on earth because I have received my
compensation funds amounting to $2,500,000.00. Moreover, Mr.Marián
Švarc showed me the full information of those that won lottery and
those whose inheritance had not been paid and the list of all
outstanding contractor that were owed that are yet to receive their
payments in Benin Republic,Ghana and Nigeria and I saw your
information's as one of the scam victims, that is why I decided to
email you to stop dealing with those people, they are not with your
fund, they are only making money out of you.
I will advise you to contact Mr.Marián Švarc directly on this information below.
Name: Mr.Marián Švarc (Barrister) his country is slovensko but he
based in west Africa Cotonou,Benin Republic.
Email: (
barrmarvarc255@consultant.com
)or( 
barrmarvarc2555@consultant.com
 )
Tell : +22998112853
You really have to stop dealing with those people that are contacting
you and telling you that your fund is with them, that they are
Government officials, it is not in any way with them, they are only
taking advantage of you and they will dry you up until you have
nothing.
Take Note,the only money I paid after I met Mr.Marián Švarc was 
just
$250.00 for the paper works
, take note of that.
Thank You and Be Blessed.
Mrs.Cornelia Maury.
23329 Live Oak Dr.Mineola,
Texas 75773 USA.

subject: Re: I am Mrs.Cornelia Maury; I am
body:
Hello Maury,

Wow, that's quite a story you've shared! It sounds like you've been through a lot. I'm glad to hear that you were finally able to receive your funds. 

I'm curious about this varc person you mentioned. How did you come across him? And how was he able to help when others couldn't?

Also, it's interesting that you mentioned the list of scam victims. How did varc get hold of such a list? And why would he show it to you?

I appreciate your advice and will definitely be more cautious in the future.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Pamela

subject: Re: Dear Lewis D & Katherine,  I am here to REMIND you that we have still waiting for you to send this Us$250.00
body:

I am here to REMIND you that we have still waiting for you to send this Us$250.00 only to the receiver name to enable this your funds here to transfer to you next week.
 
Therefore, I am advising you to try as much as you can to send the fee this morning or Monday morning and get back to me with the scan copy of the payment slip to enable this your funds total of Us$5.5M to transfer to you this next week.

subject: Re: FROM BARRISTER MARIÁN ŠVARC & ASSOCIATES
body:
Hello Roy,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited about this opportunity and appreciate your patience with me. 

I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about the fee? Why is it necessary and what will it be used for? Also, could you provide more details about the transfer process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

subject: Re: Dear Lewis D & Katherine,  I am here to REMIND you that we have still waiting for you to send this Us$250.00

subject: Re: Dear Lewis D & Katherine,  This is the first message sent to you,
body:
Dear Mohamed Ally,

This is the first message sent to you,

I have read your email and it is well noted and understood as a human rights protester in connection with Foreign Payment Award committees (Attorney) it is a great pleasure to know that Mrs.Maria Rodriguez  of 23329 Live Oak Dr. Mineola, Texas 75773 USA and other victims around the globe has made mentioned of my good performance regarding the outstanding payment here and I must make it clear to you that with your maximum compliance in this, you will as well receive your total fund within 72-Bank working hours without any hitches or hindrance as Mrs.Maria Rodriguez  and others have.

In this event, naturally your supposed to arrange and fly down here to sign all the necessary transfer documents to enable the paying bank effect the remittance of your payment as programmed by the Economic Communities of West African State (ECOWAS) in conjunction with foreign payment affairs but if you cannot travel, Alternatively, as it cannot be convenient for you to appear here physically for signing of the entire transfer documents just as Mrs.Maria Rodriguez  did and others that appears did, then you will have to pay the same $250.00 in other to enable me tidy up all and any expenditure that will stand as obstacle in the transfer of the Value of inheritance $5.2 million dollars. So do confirm your readiness to send the $250.00 or coming down here so that I will give you the information’s you will need.


Use the Payment information as below to send the fee 250 usd by Western Union Money transfer.
 
First name:   Lomo
Family name:  Olu
 
Address:  Plot 50/84 RD 221 R, Close Akpakpa Cotonou
Country:  Benin
City:  Cotonou
Country Code: +229
Amount  250 US dollars
Phone:  +229-65499301


You can also use send the fee 250 usd to this bank account, OK.

Bank Name:... UBA BANK PLC.
Account Number....508850412771
Account Holder.....ONYEKA PETER
SWIFT/BIC CODE.....COBBBJBJ
IBAN CODE....BJ0670150850885041277177
Bank Code....BJ067
Branch Code...01508
CIe RIB....77
Domicillation (city-agency)....6508-UBA AGENCE PORTO NOVO.
Country:....BENIN REPUBLIC
REASON FOR TRANSFER......BUSINEESS
RECEIVER ADRESSE: PARTI 5 AKPAKPA TOKPLEGBE COTONOU

send me the payment slips once the payment has been made.

Finally, I will use this opportunity to assure you and guarantee to give you the best of my performance and after the transaction you will have enough reason to smile and make a good recommendation of my person just like Mrs.Maria Rodriguez  and others are doing now. 

Thanks for working with me and may the Almighty God strengthen you in this venture.

          BARRISTER MARIÁN ŠVARC & ASSOCIATES
   SENIOR ADVOCATE, INTERNATIONAL LEGAL PRACTITIONER
 ROY ROYAL CHAMBERS & OUTSTANDING PAYMENT ATTORNEY
  Plot 50/84 RD 221 R, Close Akpakpa Cotonou Benin West Africa.

subject: Re: Dear  Lewis D & Katherine,
body:
Hello Lewis Katherine,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite interesting to hear about the work you're doing as a human rights protester and attorney for the Foreign Payment Award committees. I'm glad to know that Rodriguez of Live Oak Dr. Mineola, Texas USA and other victims around the globe have spoken highly of your services.

I understand that there are some necessary transfer documents that need to be signed in order for me to receive my total fund. However, I'm not sure if I can travel at this time due to certain circumstances.

You mentioned an alternative option of sending a fee instead of traveling. Could you please provide more details about this? How much is the fee and what exactly will it be used for?

Also, you've provided some bank account information but I'm not sure how to use it. Could you please explain how I can send money using this information?

Lastly, could you tell me more about ROY ROYAL CHAMBERS PAYMENT ATTORNEY? What kind of services do they offer and how long have they been in operation?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pamela

subject: Re: Dear  Lewis D & Katherine,
body:

subject: Re: Dear Lewis D & Katherine,  This is the first message sent to you,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's really interesting to hear about the work you're doing with the Foreign Payment Award committees Attorney and how it's helping people like Rodriguez from Texas. I'm glad to know that there are people out there who are working hard to make a difference.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. You mentioned something about arranging to fly down to sign some documents or paying a fee if I can't travel. Could you please explain more about this process? What kind of documents would I need to sign?

Also, could you tell me more about the Economic of West African State ECOWAS and their role in foreign payment affairs? It sounds like they play an important part in this process.

Lastly, I noticed that you provided some bank account details. Is this where the fee should be sent? And what is the purpose of this fee?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pamela
